cards.card_name: The Blade That Strikes Down the Blessed
cards.description: [ACTIVATED] Deal 20 damage to a Champion that was healed last turn. [PASSIVE] This card may be equipped to any Equipment Slot?
[PASSIVE] While this card is equipped to a Champion: that Champion gains 30 max health. [TRIGGER] If this card would be destroyed: Heal 30 damage from this Champion.
[TRIGGER] If this Champion would take damage: you can Destroy this card instead.
